extendedInfo.description: Listen to live radio from all of RTÃ's radio services: RTÃ Radio 1, RTÃ 2fm, RTÃ lyric fm and RTÃ RaidiÃ³ na Gaeltachta as well as the specialist RTÃ Digital Radio stations. Choose from a wide selection of podcasts produced by programmes across the RTÃ Radio services.

reviews.title: App is looking good
reviews.comment: Looks like this is working perfectly. When it does this is a good app
reviews.author: ian hartigan

reviews.title: Finally working!!
reviews.comment: Great app. About time they got it sorted.
reviews.author: John Caffrey

reviews.title: It finally works!
reviews.comment: No more endless buffering! I am SO glad this app was fixed. I love 2fm and being able to listen _anywhere_ is awesome.
reviews.author: Meg Holmes

reviews.title: Fixed?
reviews.comment: Gave it 1 star originally but dies appear to be working now on my note 2. Finally.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great RTE App
reviews.comment: Great service for bristol uk Stops occasionally but otherwise all good with this app
reviews.author: Joseph Daly

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: This app is great because I live in England and enjoy listening to Joe at 1.45. The radio only buffers for about 2 Secs twice for the first 10secs then I can enjoy Joe on the go without buffer!!! This is on my Sony Xperia L!
reviews.author: Con Griff

reviews.title: Want this app
reviews.comment: Won\'t stream on HTC desire. Great app on my other devices. Now its working fine. Good job. Not working again
reviews.author: Dominic o hare

reviews.title: Not user friendly
reviews.comment: Content descriptions needed for download/podcasts.  Currently all you get is the name of the show. Until you download it you dont know, what is in that particular programme, how long it is, whether its a 2min promo or the whole prog. Case in point today. \"News at One\" chose it thinking id get the full programme and all i got was a 2 min. piece on a court case about commercial rent!  It feels like this is just a token attempt at an app. Put some more effort in RTE.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Continually buffering
reviews.comment: Works on my HTC but find it is continually buffering :( Forced to use it though as unable to pick up 2 FM on my radio app.
reviews.author: Shona Power

reviews.title: RTE PLAYER APP works perfectly
reviews.comment: I`ve just installed the RTE PLAYER APP on my nexus 7 tablet version 4.22 and i`ve had no problems whatsoever.
reviews.author: Claudia Macari

reviews.title: Waste of time
reviews.comment: won\'t play on my 7\" tablet. Don\'t they ever check these apps?? Maybe they only check them on iphones....!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Avoid like the plague
reviews.comment: Installed this on my HTC one. Attempted to use it in areas with fast WiFi connection but doesn\'t work as it keeps buffering....literally have not heard a sound! Not sure why they released something that clearly doesn\'t work. I\'ve uninstalled it.
reviews.author: Christopher Brennan

reviews.title: Jellybean problems
reviews.comment: Updated my S3 to jellybean and its stopped working. Buffering,,restarting stream and so on. It wasnt great before that but now its dead jim.  And this is my radio !  Rte. Please fix .
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Really bad radio app
reviews.comment: I could never get app to worked on my phone.   I tried deleting and re adding to see if that would work but nope.
reviews.author: Helen Vallence

reviews.title: Update fixed it
reviews.comment: At first only the podcasts would play but a recent update must have fixed it for me, because the radio is working fine now. I\'m very glad since I get to listen to Radi\303\263 na Gaeltachta now!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Not working on galaxy s4 - tge most popular smartphone.  Keeps saying Buffering... Restarting... Buffering... Restarting...
reviews.author: Piotr Szober

reviews.title: Will not work on Galaxy S4
reviews.comment: I see previous comments of not working on S3 going back to last year. Same issue on S4 just buffering. No response from RTE to queries either.  I pay my licence and expect service. Please respond as to where you are at with development RTE. Very Poor, but I guess expected from State Monopoly.
reviews.author: john campbell

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work at all
reviews.comment: Fails to stream at all on Galaxy S3. Wish RTE would wake up and fix this!
reviews.author: Roy Mitchell

reviews.title: Practically useless
reviews.comment: Whoever designed and released this should get their P45 handed to them promptly. It rarely even starts on Radio1 for me and crashes every 10mins or so anyway. Marginally better on my galaxy tablet than on my s3. Probably the worst Irish radio app out there.
reviews.author: Paul McPhillips

reviews.title: Needs to be fixed
reviews.comment: Use to work, now it wont load. What the hell Rte your getting a lot of taxs payers money this should be a quick fix.
reviews.author: A Google User
